member.name: T:Plugin.Shared.Interfaces.IPlugin
member.summary: Interface for plugin implementations that can be dynamically loaded and executed by the PluginLoaderProcessor. Plugin must implement this interface to be compatible with the plugin loading system.

member.name: M:Plugin.Shared.Interfaces.IPlugin.ProcessActivityDataAsync(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.List{Shared.Models.AssignmentModel},System.String,System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Processes activity data with the same signature as BaseProcessorApplication.ProcessActivityDataAsync This method will be called by the PluginLoaderProcessor to execute the plugin's business logic
member.param: ID of the processor executing the activity
ID of the orchestrated flow entity
ID of the step being executed
Unique execution ID for this activity instance
Unique publish ID for this activity instance
Collection of assignment entities to process
Input data retrieved from cache (validated against InputSchema)
member.returns: Collection of processed activity data that will be validated against OutputSchema and saved to cache

member.name: T:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FilePostProcessing
member.summary: Plugin utilities for file post-processing operations across all file processors Provides standardized collision handling, logging, and file operations

member.name: M:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FilePostProcessing.PostProcessFileAsync``1(System.String,``0,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Post-process a file based on configuration using standardized approach
member.param: Path to the file to post-process
Configuration containing processing mode and settings

member.name: M:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FilePostProcessing.GenerateProcessedPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a processed file path with collision handling using standardized naming pattern Uses pattern: {originalPath}{processedExtension} with counter for collisions
member.returns: Processed file path with collision handling applied

member.name: M:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FilePostProcessing.MarkFileAsProcessed(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Mark file as processed by adding extension using standardized approach with collision handling
member.param: Path to the file to mark as processed

member.name: M:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FilePostProcessing.GenerateUniqueFilePath(System.String,System.String)
member.returns: Unique file path with collision handling applied

member.name: M:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FilePostProcessing.CopyToBackupWithCollisionHandling(System.String,Plugin.Shared.Utilities.IFileProcessingConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Copy file to backup folder with collision handling using precise timestamp Uses pattern: {nameWithoutExt}_{timestamp_with_milliseconds}{extension}
member.param: Path to the file to copy

member.name: M:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FilePostProcessing.GenerateOutputPath(System.String,System.String)
member.returns: Output file path with collision handling applied

member.name: M:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FilePostProcessing.MoveToBackupWithCollisionHandling(System.String,Plugin.Shared.Utilities.IFileProcessingConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Move file to backup folder with collision handling using precise timestamp Uses pattern: {nameWithoutExt}_{timestamp_with_milliseconds}{extension}
member.param: Path to the file to move

member.name: T:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FileProcessingMode
member.summary: Defines the different modes for processing files after they have been read Each mode specifies what to do with the original file AFTER successfully reading it Shared across all file processor types for consistency

member.name: F:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FileProcessingMode.LeaveUnchanged
member.summary: Leave the original file unchanged after reading

member.name: F:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FileProcessingMode.MarkAsProcessed
member.summary: Rename file with processed extension (e.g., .processed)

member.name: F:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FileProcessingMode.Delete
member.summary: Delete the original file after reading

member.name: F:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FileProcessingMode.MoveToBackup
member.summary: Move file to backup folder (original file moved)

member.name: F:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FileProcessingMode.CopyToBackup
member.summary: Copy file to backup folder (original file remains)

member.name: F:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FileProcessingMode.BackupAndMarkProcessed
member.summary: Create timestamped backup copy, then mark as processed

member.name: F:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.FileProcessingMode.BackupAndDelete
member.summary: Create timestamped backup copy, then delete original

member.name: T:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.IFileProcessingConfiguration
member.summary: Interface for file processing configurations to enable shared post-processing utilities

member.name: P:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.IFileProcessingConfiguration.ProcessingMode
member.summary: Processing mode that determines what to do with files after processing

member.name: P:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.IFileProcessingConfiguration.ProcessedExtension
member.summary: Extension to add when marking files as processed

member.name: P:Plugin.Shared.Utilities.IFileProcessingConfiguration.BackupFolder
member.summary: Backup folder path for backup operations
